mapper.select: select fb.id, CONCAT(pi.project_code,'-', fb.feedback_num) as feedback_num, fb.organization_id, fb.project_id, fb.type, lv.name as type_name, fb.summary, fb.description, fb.reporter, fb.assignee_id, fb.status, lv2.name as status_name, fb.email, fb.application_id, fb.screen_size, fb.browser, fb.creation_date, fb.last_update_date, fb.object_version_number from feedback fb, lookup_value lv, lookup_value lv2, agile_project_info pi where fb.project_id = #{projectId} and fb.id = #{id} and fb.type = lv.value_code and fb.status = lv2.value_code and pi.project_id = #{projectId}
